mapper.select:
select
from zhongan_info where id_card = #{idcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and customer_name = #{customername,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by create_date desc limit 1

mapper.update:
update zhongan_info
id_card = #{idCard,jdbcType=BIGINT},
age = #{age,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gender = #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mobile_city = #{mobileCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mobile_comm_duration = #{mobileCommDuration,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mobile_comm_sts = #{mobileCommSts,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phoneid_name_check = #{phoneidNameCheck,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
high_risk_behavior = #{highRiskBehavior,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rsn_high_risk = #{rsnHighRisk,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rsn_long_overdue = #{rsnLongOverdue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rsn_multi_loan = #{rsnMultiLoan,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rsn_policy_restrict = #{rsnPolicyRestrict,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rsn_risk_rec = #{rsnRiskRec,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rsp_lawsuit_alllist = #{rspLawsuitAlllist,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rsp_speclist_inblacklist = #{rspSpeclistInblacklist,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rsp_speclist_maxdftlevel = #{rspSpeclistMaxdftlevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rsp_watchlist_detail = #{rspWatchlistDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
high_risk_record = #{highRiskRecord,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
customer_name = #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
customer_type = #{customerType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
result_message = #{resultMessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update zhongan_info set id_card = #{idCard,jdbcType=BIGINT}, age = #{age,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile_city = #{mobileCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile_comm_duration = #{mobileCommDuration,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile_comm_sts = #{mobileCommSts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phoneid_name_check = #{phoneidNameCheck,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, high_risk_behavior = #{highRiskBehavior,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rsn_high_risk = #{rsnHighRisk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rsn_long_overdue = #{rsnLongOverdue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rsn_multi_loan = #{rsnMultiLoan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rsn_policy_restrict = #{rsnPolicyRestrict,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rsn_risk_rec = #{rsnRiskRec,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rsp_lawsuit_alllist = #{rspLawsuitAlllist,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rsp_speclist_inblacklist = #{rspSpeclistInblacklist,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rsp_speclist_maxdftlevel = #{rspSpeclistMaxdftlevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rsp_watchlist_detail = #{rspWatchlistDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, high_risk_record = #{highRiskRecord,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, customer_name = #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, customer_type = #{customerType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, result_message = #{resultMessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select b.* from loan_customer b where b.principal_cust_id =( select a.loan_customer_id from loan_order a where a.id = #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}) and b.`status` =0

select DISTINCT z.* from zhongan_info z inner join ( select SUBSTRING_INDEX(GROUP_CONCAT(id order by create_date desc separator ','),',',1) as id from zhongan_info GROUP BY id_card ) d on d.id = z.id and z.order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and z.id_card in ( select b.id_card from loan_customer b where b.principal_cust_id =( select a.loan_customer_id from loan_order a where a.id = #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT})and b.`status` = 0 and b.cust_type ! = 4 )

SELECT a.id AS orderId, c.`name` AS salemanName, d.`name` AS partnerName FROM loan_order a LEFT JOIN loan_base_info b ON a.loan_base_info_id = b.id LEFT JOIN employee c ON b.salesman_id = c.id LEFT JOIN partner d ON b.partner_id = d.id where a.id = #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
